description.name: Bulk Pricing Updater
description.tagline: Apply rule based pricing changes to existing customers with ease.
description.long:
By default, the prices that customers pay for products, services, addons and domains are locked in at the time they sign up.

Using the Bulk Pricing Updater utility however, you can apply pricing changes to existing customers.

For more information and usage instructions, please refer to the documentation link.
